FuncDef:
This command creates the accounting policy context that can be applied to a SAP or SDP. 
An accounting policy must be defined before it can be associated with a SAP or SDP. 
If thepolicy-iddoes not exist, an error message is generated.
A maximum of one accounting policy can be associated with a SAP or SDP at one time. Accounting policies are configured in theconfig>logcontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the accounting policy-id as configured in the config>log>accounting-policy context. Values-1 to 99.
